tweet.text: In 1844 William Leidesdorff became 1st #AfricanAmerican consul; he was appointed vice consul in Yerba Buena (now San Francisco). #BHM2014
tweet.html: In 1844 William Leidesdorff became 1st #AfricanAmerican consul; he was appointed vice consul in Yerba Buena (now San Francisco). #BHM2014
